About SearchyFile :
At SearchyFile, we believe our solution will revolutionize students' daily study routines. We provide a smart extension for students in all colleges and universities over the world.
SearchyFile will help you find any information that you want from the files on your course site without downloading them, it will save you a lot of time and computer memory.

How to use this extension:
This extension work on the academic courses sites.
•	Click on the SearchyFile icon on your address bar
•	Enter the expression that you want to search and click on the "Search" button. 
•	The extension will present all the files that contain the expression that you searching for.
•	By clicking on the preview button you can see a preview of the sentence in which your expression appears on.

Important 
•	If the web page doesn't contain any files, the extension won't show any results for the search.
•	This extension supports the following file type: PDF, DOCX, PPTX
